name: Moment of Clarity
preparation:
Combine all ingredients except the tea in a tabletop electric tea kettle.
Bring to a boil and quickly remove.
Place the tea in a tea strainer, and place the strainer over a pouring vessel.
Pour the hot cocktail over the tea, and discard the tea.
Add a large ice cube to an Old Fashioned glass.
Slowly pour the hot mixture over the ice cube.
Express a lemon twist over the cocktail and discard. Serve.
